40 
41  //use a pcl function for fitting
42  bool cylinder::fitCylinder(){
43 
44  transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
45 
46  pcl::NormalEstimation<pcl::PointXYZRGBA, pcl::Normal> ne; //
47  pcl::SACSegmentationFromNormals<pcl::PointXYZRGBA, pcl::Normal> seg; //
48  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> extract;//
49  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::Normal> extract_normals;
50  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr cloud_normals (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
51  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> ());
52  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients_plane (new pcl::ModelCoefficients), coefficients_cylinder (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);//
53  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers_plane (new pcl::PointIndices), inliers_cylinder (new pcl::PointIndices);
54 
55  ne.setSearchMethod (tree);
56  ne.setInputCloud (original_cloud_);
57  ne.setKSearch (50);
58  ne.compute (*cloud_normals);
59 
60  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
61  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_CYLINDER);
62  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_LMEDS);
63  seg.setNormalDistanceWeight (0.1);
64  seg.setMaxIterations (10000);
65  seg.setDistanceThreshold (0.05);
66  seg.setRadiusLimits (0, 0.5);
67  seg.setInputCloud (original_cloud_);
68  seg.setInputNormals (cloud_normals);
69 
70  // Obtain the cylinder inliers and coefficients
71  seg.segment (*inliers_cylinder, *coefficients_cylinder);
72 
73  extract.setInputCloud (original_cloud_);
74  extract.setIndices (inliers_cylinder);
75  extract.setNegative (false);
76  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cylinder_points (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
77  extract.filter ( *cylinder_points );
78  cylinder_points_ = cylinder_points;
79 
80  if (cylinder_points_->points.empty ())
81  {
82  return false;
83  }
84 
85  double radius = coefficients_cylinder->values[6];
86  info_.push_back( radius ); //get radius
87 
88  // Find transformation
89 
90  double x = coefficients_cylinder->values[0], y = coefficients_cylinder->values[1], z = coefficients_cylinder->values[2];
91  double p_x = coefficients_cylinder->values[3], p_y = coefficients_cylinder->values[4], p_z = coefficients_cylinder->values[5];
92 
93  Eigen::Vector3d position(x,y,z); //random position on the axis
94  // w is the axis of the cylinder which will be aligned with the z reference frame of the cylinder
95  Eigen::Vector3d w(p_x, p_y, p_z);
96  Eigen::Vector3d u(0, 0, 1); // -y kinect
97 
98  // is object if twisted the z axis is the same to x axis. we change the x axis with a orthogonal vector
99 
100  if((u.dot(w) < 0))
101  {
102  w = w * -1; //change sign
103  }
104 
105  Eigen::Vector3d x_new = (w.cross(u)).normalized();
106  Eigen::Vector3d y_new = (x_new.cross(w)).normalized();
107 
108  Eigen::Matrix3d rotation;
109  rotation.col(0) = - x_new; // x
110  rotation.col(1) = y_new; // y
111  rotation.col(2) = w; // z
112 
113  // Compose the transformation and return it
114 
115  transformation_.row(0) << rotation.row(0), position[0];
116  transformation_.row(1) << rotation.row(1), position[1];
117  transformation_.row(2) << rotation.row(2), position[2];
118  transformation_.row(3) << 0,0,0, 1;
119 
120  // Find Height in cylinder frame
121 
122  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cylinder_points_local (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
123  Eigen::Matrix4d transformation_i = transformation_.inverse();
124  pcl::transformPointCloud(*cylinder_points_, *cylinder_points_local, transformation_i);
125 
126  double z_min, z_max;
127 
128  z_min= cylinder_points_local->points[0].z;
129  z_max= cylinder_points_local->points[0].z;
130 
131  for (unsigned int i=1; i< cylinder_points_local->points.size(); i++)
132  {
133  if(z_min > cylinder_points_local->points[i].z )
134  {
135  z_min = cylinder_points_local->points[i].z;
136 
137  }
138 
139  if(z_max < cylinder_points_local->points[i].z)
140  {
141  z_max = cylinder_points_local->points[i].z;
142 
143  }
144  }
145 
146  double height = z_max - z_min;
147  info_.push_back( height );
148 
149  // find cylinder center since
150  double x_center = 0. , y_center = 0., z_center = z_min + ( height ) / 2.;
151 
152  Eigen::Matrix4d centerTrasformation_local = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
153 
154  centerTrasformation_local(0,3) = x_center;
155  centerTrasformation_local(1,3) = y_center;
156  centerTrasformation_local(2,3) = z_center;
157 
158  Eigen::Matrix4d centerTrasformation_global = transformation_ * centerTrasformation_local;
159  transformation_ = centerTrasformation_global;
160  transformation_i = transformation_.inverse();
161 
162  pcl::transformPointCloud(*original_cloud_, *cylinder_points_, transformation_i);
163 
164  //calculation if the geometry is lying or standing respect the normal plane
165  Eigen::Vector3d nomal_plani_in_cyl_frame = transformation_i.block<3,3>(0,0) * Eigen::Vector3d( 0, 0, 1);
166  nomal_plani_in_cyl_frame.normalize();
167 
168  Eigen::Vector3d vec_temp;
169  vec_temp = nomal_plani_in_cyl_frame;
170 
171  vec_temp.normalize();
172  double dotproduct = vec_temp.dot(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,1));
173 
174  double theta = std::acos(dotproduct); //angle between plane and cylidner's z_axis
175 
176  double isLaying = 0.0;
177  //45 degree is the threshold chosen
178  if(((theta >= -15.*(3.14/180.)) && (theta <= 15.*(3.14/180.))))
179  {
180  isLaying = 0.;
181  }
182  else
183  {
184  isLaying = 1.0;
185  }
186 
187  info_.push_back( isLaying );
188 
189  double isFull = 1.;
190 
191  if ( isLaying == 0.)
192  {
193  // Check if the cylinder is empty
194 
195  pcl::PointXYZRGBA point_center; //center point at top of the object
196 
197  z_max= cylinder_points_->points[0].z;
198  for (unsigned int i=1; i< cylinder_points_->points.size(); i++)
199  {
200  if(z_max < cylinder_points_->points[i].z)
201  {
202  z_max = cylinder_points_->points[i].z;
203 
204  }
205  }
206 
207  point_center.x = 0.;
208  point_center.y = 0.;
209  point_center.z = z_max;
210 
211  std::vector< int > k_indices;
212  std::vector< float > k_sqr_distances;
213  double dim_s;
214 
215  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
216  tree->setInputCloud ( cylinder_points_ );
217 
218  dim_s = radius*0.8; //less than half
219 
220  tree->radiusSearch( point_center, dim_s, k_indices, k_sqr_distances,0 );
221 
222  if(k_indices.size() < (dim_s*300))
223  {
224  isFull = 0.; // empty
225  }
226 
227  }
228 
229  info_.push_back( isFull );
230 
231  info_.push_back((((double)inliers_cylinder->indices.size()) / ((double)cylinder_points_->points.size()))*100);
232 
233 
234  // int index = info_.size()-1;
235  // ROS_INFO("ratio cyl: %g", info_[index]);
236  // std::cout<<"rapp cyl: "<<info_[index]<<std::endl;
237 
238  /* info contains: radius, height, isLying, isfull, ratio between number of inliers/number of pointCloud points*/
239 
240  return true;
241  }
242 
243 }
